definitions.body: lit., pure, i.e. unmixed, free from foreign substances, of olive oil Ex 27:20, Le 24:2, of frankincense Ex 30:34, Le 24:7 (all P and H).

fig., pure, clean, righteous (only Jb Pr):—of man Job 8:6 (‖[[יׇשָׁר]]), Job 33:9 (+ [[בְּלִי פָָשַׁע]]; ‖[[חַף]]); as subst. = the pure, righteous [[וְזַךְ יׇשָׁר פָּעֳלוֹ]] Pr 21:8 (opp. [[וׇזׇרָ]] q.v.); of mode of life [[כָּל־דַּרְכֵי־אִישׁ זַךְ בְּעֵינׇיו]] Pr 16:2; of mode of action ([[פָּעֳלוֹ]]) Pr 20:11 (‖[[יׇשָׁר]]); of doctrine ([[לִקְחִי]]) Job 11:4 (‖[[בַּר הייתי]]); of prayer Job 16:17 (‖[[לאׁ חָמָס בְּכַפָָּי]]).
